svt_axi_system_monitor_transaction_xml_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_system_monitor_transaction_xml_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Monitor callback class containing implementation to generate PA output for AXI Transaction. Called when svt_axi_system_configuration :: enable_xml_gen is set to 1.


Public Member Functions

function void  master_xact_fully_associated_to_slave_xacts ( svt_axi_system_monitor system_monitor , svt_axi_system_transaction sys_xact )

Called after the system monitor correlates all the bytes of a master transaction to corresponding slave transactions

sys_xact - A reference to the system transaction descriptor object of intereset

  function void
 svt_axi_system_monitor_transaction_xml_callback::post_coherent_and_snoop_transaction_association
 (  svt_axi_system_monitor system_monitor , svt_axi_transaction coherent_xact , svt_axi_snoop_transaction snoop_xacts [$]  ) 

Called after the system monitor associates snoop transactions to a coherent transaction

coherent_xact - A reference to the coherent data descriptor object of interest.

snoop_xacts - A queue of all associated snoop transactions
